event: Other fall to lower level 6 to 10 feet
final_narrative: A worker was hospitalized on 01/06/2015 doing some clean-up work on a roof, he fell approximately 8.5 to 9 feet while descending a ladder. The worker fractured his leg and was hospitalized overnight at Athens Regional Medical Center. He underwent surgery, at which time a pin was inserted in the tibia of the fractured leg.
